paragraphs.text:
%md
## Requête 3

Dans ce notebook, nous construisons la requête 3:

*Pour une source de donnés passée en paramètre (`gkg.SourceCommonName`) affichez les thèmes, personnes, lieux dont les articles de cette sources parlent ainsi que le le nombre d’articles et le ton moyen des articles (pour chaque thème/personne/lieu); permettez une agrégation par jour/mois/année.*

msg.data:
Requête 3

Dans ce notebook, nous construisons la requête 3:

Pour une source de donnés passée en paramètre (gkg.SourceCommonName) affichez les thèmes, personnes, lieux dont les articles de cette sources parlent ainsi que le le nombre d’articles et le ton moyen des articles (pour chaque thème/personne/lieu); permettez une agrégation par jour/mois/année.

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions
import org.apache.spark.input.PortableDataStream
import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream
import java.io.BufferedReader
import java.io.InputStreamReader

import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra._

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions
import org.apache.spark.input.PortableDataStream
import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream
import java.io.BufferedReader
import java.io.InputStreamReader
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra._

paragraphs.text:
// define UDF functions
def toYear(s : String): Int = if (s.isEmpty) 0 else (s.slice(0, 0 + 4)).toInt
def toMonth(s : String): Int = if (s.isEmpty) 0 else (s.slice(4, 4 + 2)).toInt
def toDay(s : String): Int = if (s.isEmpty) 0 else (s.slice(6, 6 + 2)).toInt

def getTone(tones: String): Double = tones.split(",")(0).toDouble

// define UDF
val udfToYear = udf(toYear _)
val udfToMonth = udf(toMonth _)
val udfToDay = udf(toDay _)

val udfGetTone = udf(getTone _)

msg.data:
toYear: (s: String)Int
toMonth: (s: String)Int
toDay: (s: String)Int
getTone: (tones: String)Double
udfToYear: org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,IntegerType,Some(List(StringType)))
udfToMonth: org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,IntegerType,Some(List(StringType)))
udfToDay: org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,IntegerType,Some(List(StringType)))
udfGetTone: org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,DoubleType,Some(List(StringType)))

paragraphs.text:
// Load GKG
val rddGkgEng = sc.binaryFiles("s3://aouani-habib-telecom-gdelt2019/20191201[0-9]*.gkg.csv.zip") // charger quelques fichers via une regex
   .flatMap {  // decompresser les fichiers
       case (name: String, content: PortableDataStream) =>
          val zis = new ZipInputStream(content.open)
          Stream.continually(zis.getNextEntry)
                .takeWhile{ case null => zis.close(); false
                            case _ => true }
                .flatMap { _ =>
                    val br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(zis))
                    Stream.continually(br.readLine()).takeWhile(_ != null)
                }
    }

val dfGkgEng = rddGkgEng.map(x => x.split("\t")).toDF()

msg.data:
rddGkgEng: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[1] at flatMap at <console>:38
dfGkgEng: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [value: array<string>]

rddGkgTrans: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[4] at flatMap at <console>:40
dfGkgTrans: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [value: array<string>]
dfGkg: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [value: array<string>]

paragraphs.text:
// Select columns and cast
val dfGkg_3 = dfGkg
    .withColumn("_tmp", $"value")
    .select($"_tmp".getItem(0).as("gkgrecordid"),
            udfToYear($"_tmp".getItem(1)).as("year"),
            udfToMonth($"_tmp".getItem(1)).as("month"),
            udfToDay($"_tmp".getItem(1)).as("day"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(3).as("sourcecommonname"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(8).as("v2themes"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(10).as("v2locations"),
            $"_tmp".getItem(12).as("v2persons"),
            udfGetTone($"_tmp".getItem(15)).as("Tone"))
    .withColumn("v2themes", split($"v2themes", ";"))
    .withColumn("v2locations", split($"v2locations", ";"))
    .withColumn("v2persons", split($"v2persons", ";"))
    .filter(!($"SourceCommonName" === ""))

dfGkg_3.printSchema()

msg.data:
root
 |-- gkgrecordid: string (nullable = true)
 |-- year: integer (nullable = false)
 |-- month: integer (nullable = false)
 |-- day: integer (nullable = false)
 |-- sourcecommonname: string (nullable = true)
 |-- v2themes: array (nullable = true)
 |    |-- element: string (containsNull = true)
 |-- v2locations: array (nullable = true)
 |    |-- element: string (containsNull = true)
 |-- v2persons: array (nullable = true)
 |    |-- element: string (containsNull = true)
 |-- Tone: double (nullable = false)

dfGkg_3: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [gkgrecordid: string, year: int ... 7 more fields]

paragraphs.text:
// Themes
// Explode + cleaning
val df3GkgThemes = dfGkg_3
    .withColumn("theme", explode_outer($"v2themes"))
    .withColumn("theme", split($"theme", ",")(0))
    .select("gkgrecordid",
            "sourcecommonName",
            "year", "month", "day",
            "tone", "theme")
    .filter(!($"theme" === ""))    
    .dropDuplicates("gkgrecordid", "theme")

// Aggregation
val df3GkgThemesAgg = df3GkgThemes
    .groupBy("sourcecommonname", "year", "month", "day", "theme")
    .agg(count($"gkgrecordid").as("numarticles"),
         avg($"tone").as("avgtone"))

msg.data:
df3GkgThemes: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [gkgrecordid: string, sourcecommonName: string ... 5 more fields]
df3GkgThemesAgg: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [sourcecommonname: string, year: int ... 5 more fields]

paragraphs.text:
// Persons
val df3GkgPersons = dfGkg_3
    .withColumn("person", explode_outer($"v2persons"))
    .withColumn("person", split($"person", ",")(0))
    .select("gkgrecordid",
            "sourcecommonname",
            "year", "month", "day",
            "tone", "person")
    .filter(!($"person" === ""))
    .dropDuplicates("gkgrecordid", "person")

// Aggregation
val df3GkgPersonsAgg = df3GkgPersons
    .groupBy("sourcecommonname", "year", "month", "day", "person")
    .agg(count($"gkgrecordid").as("numarticles"),
         avg($"tone").as("avgtone"))

msg.data:
df3GkgPersons: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [gkgrecordid: string, sourcecommonname: string ... 5 more fields]
df3GkgPersonsAgg: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [sourcecommonname: string, year: int ... 5 more fields]

paragraphs.text:
// Locations
val df3GkgLocations = dfGkg_3
    .withColumn("location", explode_outer($"v2locations"))
    .withColumn("location", split($"location", "#")(2))
    .select("gkgrecordid",
            "sourcecommonname",
            "year", "month", "day",
            "tone", "location")
    .filter(!($"Location" === ""))
    .dropDuplicates("gkgrecordid", "location")

// Aggregation
val df3GkgLocationsAgg = df3GkgLocations
    .groupBy("sourcecommonname", "year", "month", "day", "location")
    .agg(count($"gkgrecordid").as("numarticles"),
         avg($"tone").as("avgtone"))
